module.title: Info: Galleries
module.description:
Standard image gallery presentation.
This module presents beforehand registered galleries and their images. Uploaded images will be scaled to default size and to thumbnail size. Prepared galleries can be indexed in list or matrix mode.
For showing images within a lightbox, use one of these modules: list> - UI_JS_fancyBox - UI_JS_Darkbox <list
A gallery can be injected into a static HTML page by shortcode [gallery:#]. A gallery index can be injected by shortcode [galleries].
To register galleries and images, use module Manage_Content_Images within a backend instance.
module.log: Added hook support and event onRenderContent.
Extend matrix mode by list mode.
Apply fancyBox auto class from module.
Support shortcode for gallery and gallery index.
Refactoring rendering into several view helpers.
Cleanup. Prepare move to public modules.
Imported module from protected SVN repository.
module.author: Christian Würker
